title: VR-Based Science Learning Optimization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science concept comprehension and smartphone usage capability
context.additional_context: Environment design focused on maximizing learning outcomes through VR content accessible via smartphones.

learning_goals: Students can observe scientific phenomena in a VR environment and accurately explain core principles with over 80% accuracy.
Applying cognitive load management strategies during VR learning improves learning efficiency by over 30%.
Students can present case analyses on the impact of simplified VR design on learning motivation and concentration.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
